titles.title: Children Of The Heavenly King (easy nice

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Children of the heav'nly King As ye journey sweetly sing Sing your Savior's worthy praise Glorious in His works and ways{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We are trav'ling home to God In the way the fathers trod They are happy now and we Soon their happiness shall see{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shout ye little flock and blest You on Jesus' throne shall rest There your seat is now prepared There your kingdom and reward{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lift your eyes ye sons of light Zion's city is in sight There our endless home shall be There our Lord we soon shall see{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Fear not brethren joyful stand On the borders of your land Jesus Christ your Father's Son Bids you undismayed go on{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord obediently we go Gladly leaving all below Only Thou our Leader be And we still will follow Thee{/lang-eng}
